title: BeSoccer - Soccer Live Score
description:
Premier League 2019-20 begins: live soccer scores and standings
Breaking transfer news: Real Madrid & Barcelona
Standings and live scores from Liga MX 2019 and MLS
Besoccer Live scores | Latest soccer news
BeSoccer is the best app for live soccer scores. On the app, you can follow more than 10.000 competitions. You can follow the matches live and receive notifications of goals, line-ups, news, transfers, rumours... In addition, you can check out the most comprehensive soccer stats for all of your teams and favourite players like Leo Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo, Neymar, Mbappe, Kane, Hazard, Griezmann, Salah, Mané, Sergio Ramos, Modric, Pique...
⭐ All the football at the touch of a button
⚽ PERSONALISE THE APP TO SUIT YOUR OWN INTERESTS
Receive live notifications of your favourite teams and players: all the goals, results, league tables, squads and team line-ups, cards, injuries, movements in the transfer market, etc...
⚽ LEAGUE TABLES, RESULTS, STATS AND MUCH MORE
All the information from the main leagues and competitions around the world: La Liga, Premier League, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, MLS, Liga MX and other competitions like Champions League, Europa League, Concacaf Champions, Gold Cup, among others. Don't miss anything that happens in the 2019-20 season follow the matches online and live with us.
With BeSoccer, you will be able to follow all the second divisions from every country in the world.
For example, in USA, you can follow live the MLS, USL Championship, USL League one and two, NASL, NPSL and the Women's Premier Soccer League (WPSL).
⚽ THE BIGGEST FOOTBALL DATABASE IN THE WORLD
We have the most comprehensive information on all the clubs: Real Madrid, Barcelona, Manchester United, Manchester City, Arsenal, Liverpool, Chelsea, PSG, Juventus, Bayern, LA Galaxy; and on your favourite players: Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo, Hazard, Sergio Ramos, Pique, Neymar, Mbappe, Mo Salah, Mane, Luka Modric, Harry Kane, Ibrahimovic, Rooney...
⚽ PLAYER COMPARISON
You can compare players and see who has played more matches, better goalscoring statistics, assists, attributes, trophies and also to clear up your questions: Who has more titles? Messi or Ronaldo? Hazard or Salah? Mbappe or Neymar? Which player has more goals?
⚽ LIVE TRANSFER WINDOW
Keep up to date with all the transfer news: you will have access to all the transfer news and rumours, players in and out at your favourite teams and transfer activity in all competitions. Who are Real Madrid expected to sign? Which are the latest Barcelona rumours? How is the transfer market in La Liga, MLS or the Premier League? Who will Manchester City o United sign? All that is our news and live scores app.
⚽ OTHER CHARACTERISTICS
All the kick off times for today's matches as well as for every day, as well as letting you know where to watch all the games televised.
News and detailed information of your favourite times like Real Madrid, Barcelona, Manchester United, Manchester City, Arsenal, Liverpool, Chelsea, PSG, Juventus, Bayern, LA Galaxy, etc
Follow all the games live and participate in the comments and debate with our large amount of users.
Minute by minute commentaries of live matches
Analysis and predictions of matches based on our users' opinions.
Updated interface, now it's much easier to use!
Improved performance, easier and quicker than ever before
News from other sports (basketball, athletics, tennis, triathlon)
⭐ If you are searching for football, you will find results.
We are constantly improving the app thanks to your suggestions and comments! Our goal is get the definitive app for Resultados de Futbol (football scores)
If your league is not there, let us know and we will add it.
Get in contact and share your comments with us!
Facebook Facebook.com/besoccerlivescore
Twitter : @BeSoccer_com
Instagram : besoccer.en
Emails : soporte@besoccer.com
